statements: SELECT id, material_name, toxicity_level, research_date FROM toxicity_research_findings ORDER BY research_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT material_name, toxicity_level FROM toxicity_research_findings ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT * FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE toxicity_level = 'High'
SELECT id, material_name FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE research_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT material_name, research_date FROM toxicity_research_findings ORDER BY research_date ASC
SELECT * FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE toxicity_level = 'High' ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, toxicity_level FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE research_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT id, material_name, research_date FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE toxicity_level = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE material_name LIKE '%acid%' ORDER BY research_date ASC;
SELECT id, toxicity_level, research_date FROM toxicity_research_findings WHERE material_name = 'Lead';
SELECT name, toxicity_level, research_date FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity
SELECT * FROM RegulatorySubmissions
SELECT submission_type, submission_date, submission_id FROM RegulatorySubmissions
SELECT research_date, name, toxicity_level FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity
SELECT submission_id, submission_type, submission_date FROM RegulatorySubmissions
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity WHERE toxicity_level > 5 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, toxicity_level FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT submission_id, submission_type FROM RegulatorySubmissions WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY submission_id
SELECT name, toxicity_level, research_date FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity WHERE toxicity_level < 3
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterialsToxicity JOIN RegulatorySubmissions ON NanoMaterialsToxicity.toxicity_level = RegulatorySubmissions.submission_id
SELECT * FROM toxic_materials;
SELECT material_name, toxicity_level FROM toxic_materials WHERE toxicity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM research_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, researcher_name FROM research_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report';
SELECT submission_name, submission_date FROM regulatory_submissions WHERE toxic_material_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM toxic_materials;
SELECT material_name, toxicity_level FROM toxic_materials WHERE toxicity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM research_documents WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, research_document_id FROM research_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT t.material_name, r.document_name, r.document_date FROM toxic_materials t JOIN regulatory_submissions s ON t.id = s.toxic_material_id JOIN research_documents r ON r.id = s.research_document_id;
SELECT * FROM ToxicityStudies;
SELECT study_id, researcher_name, toxicity_rating FROM ToxicityStudies ORDER BY study_id DESC;
SELECT study_id, study_date, researcher_name FROM ToxicityStudies WHERE toxicity_rating = 'High';
SELECT material_name, manufacturer FROM NanoMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Nanoparticle';
SELECT submission_id, regulatory_agency, status FROM RegulatorySubmissions WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ToxicityStudies ORDER BY study_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT study_id, toxicity_rating, researcher_name FROM ToxicityStudies WHERE toxicity_rating='High' AND study_date>'2022-01-01'
SELECT ts.*, nm.material_name FROM ToxicityStudies ts JOIN NanoMaterials nm ON ts.nano_material_id = nm.nano_material_id

SELECT rs.researcher_name, rs.specialization, rs.contact_email, ts.toxicity_rating FROM Researchers rs JOIN ToxicityStudies ts ON rs.researcher_name = ts.researcher_name ORDER BY ts.toxicity_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM ToxicityStudies WHERE study_id IN (SELECT study_id FROM RegulatorySubmissions WHERE status='Approved' AND regulatory_agency='FDA')
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT id, full_name, email FROM Researchers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT id, department FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Physics';
SELECT * FROM Findings WHERE study_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterials WHERE toxicity_level = 'High' AND researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterials WHERE toxicity_level = 'High';
SELECT id, name, researcher_id FROM NanoMaterials ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT rs.location, rs.capacity, r.full_name FROM ResearchStudios rs JOIN Researchers r ON rs.professor_id = r.id;

SELECT f.result, f.study_date, r.full_name AS researcher, rs.location AS studio_location FROM Findings f JOIN Researchers r ON f.researcher_id = r.id JOIN ResearchStudios rs ON f.studio_id = rs.id WHERE f.study_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT fs.submission_date, fs.status, r.full_name AS reviewer, f.result FROM RegulatorSubmissions fs JOIN Researchers r ON fs.reviewer_id = r.id JOIN Findings f ON fs.finding_id = f.id;
